channel.title: n5800 on 취미로 프로그래밍을 하는 사람입니다.
channel.description: Recent content in n5800 on 취미로 프로그래밍을 하는 사람입니다.

item.title: 노키아 n5800 의 카메라 화질(압축율) 올리기.
item.description: Nokia 5800 Tips and Tricks Thread: 1- Copy z:\private\10202BE9\10282EDC.txt to c:\private\10202BE9 2- Edit the file and change the following line : 0x3001A string ‘QualitySetLevel=306,ImageFileMimeType=image/jpeg,ImageWidth=2592,ImageHeight=1944,ImageFileExtension=.jpg,ImageEncoderUID=0x00000000,CompressionQuality=85,EstimatedSize=650000,CameraDisplayId=2,CamcorderVisible=350’ 0 cap_rd=alwayspass cap_wr=alwaysfail to: 0x3001A string ‘QualitySetLevel=306,ImageFileMimeType=image/jpeg,ImageWidth=2592,ImageHeight=1944,ImageFileExtension=.jpg,ImageEncoderUID=0x00000000,CompressionQuality=100,EstimatedSize=890000,CameraDisplayId=2,CamcorderVisible=350’ 0 cap_rd=alwayspass cap_wr=alwaysfail 3- Save and restart. The photos (at the 5MP settings) now are an average of 900KB instead of 600KB, which means less JPEG compression, which means theoretically better quality."
